​​​​​​​​​Our Mission:
The mission of the Maryland Energy Administration (MEA) is to promote clean, affordable, reliable energy and energy-related greenhouse gas emission reductions to benefit Marylanders in a just and equitable manner.

Main_Content
​​​​​​​​​Our Mission:
The mission of the Maryland Energy Administration (MEA) is to promote clean, affordable, reliable energy and energy-related greenhouse gas emission reductions to benefit Marylanders in a just and equitable manner.
answer:
​​Our Vision:​​MEA will advance impactful energy policies and programs to help achieve Maryland’s clean energy and greenhouse gas reduction goals.​

Help Stop Fraud in State
Government
The Maryland General Assembly’s Office
of Legislative Audits operates a toll-free
fraud hotline to receive allegations of
fraud and/or abuse of State government
resources.

question:
Take Our Survey
Help Stop Fraud in State
Government
The Maryland General Assembly’s Office
of Legislative Audits operates a toll-free
fraud hotline to receive allegations of
fraud and/or abuse of State government
resources.
answer:
Information reported to the
hotline in the past has helped to eliminate
certain fraudulent activities and protect
State resources.
